Articles.Content:
This challenge involves replicating the famous Levy-9 comet impact with Jupiter, you must take as many asteroids as possible to Jool, then you must dock them in a line (I don't mind if you line them up before) and send them flying into Jool. I will be even happier if you separate them as they enter the atmosphere.

The most I have done is 2.

Here's my attempt, I had to do it again but luckily had all but one of the craft I used originally.

And now re-entry.

I think the point system is as followed:

number of asteroids * class

A=1

B=2

C=3

D=4

E=5

Double points if you fragment it (split up the asteroids so they're falling in on their own)

You're right, remember that when an asteroid is docked with it shouldn't disappear, therefore with enough waiting, you could do it with 7 E-class asteroids. I can't wait to see what you guys can do!

Mine was with a C and a B class and they did not fragment, therefore, I would have got 5 points.
